Author: spicy-witch
Text: ew god I'm so sorry you deal with that.  every dinner I have with my mom it ends with my crying and hyperventilating in my car due to her comments. she even had/(I believe still has) an ED. I dont understand that she chooses me out of my other two sisters that arent tall, lanky, and awkward stupid sickly thin (quite the opposite actually) to make comments on.  blows my fucking mind that I'm the one getting the "are you pregnant?"
